panels.description: There are many things that can bring Scale CNSA to degrade state. This panel gives an overview count - the bigger number, the worse situation is.
panels.title: Scale CNSA Degrades

panels.description: Compute nodes where Scale CNSA is deployed - this panel is showing their number has been changed.
panels.title: Changes in cluster nodes count

panels.description: The number of PVCs having capacity usage above their warning threshold.

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace=~"${k8s_namespace}"} ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace=~"${k8s_namespace}"} )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace=~"${k8s_namespace}"} )) >= (${warning_threshold} / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.title: PVCs above Warning threshold

panels.description: Compute nodes where Scale CNSA is deployed - this panel is showing their number has been changed.
panels.title: PVCs in Pending state

panels.description: The number of used PVCs that lost their underlying PersistentVolume. This may happen temporarily during DELETE or failures.
panels.title: PVCs in Lost state

panels.description: Count of Scale related containers in status ready
panels.title: Scale container status ready

panels.description: Count of Scale related containers which has been restarted (per namespace)
panels.title: Scale container restarted

panels.description: The number of PVCs that may reach capacity within 24h.
panels.title: PVCs Full in 24h - Based on daily usage

panels.description: The number of PVCs that may reach capacity within 3 days.
panels.title: PVCs Full in 3 days - Based on daily usage

panels.description: The number of PVCs that may reach capacity within 1 week.
panels.title: PVCs Full in 1 week - Based on daily usage
